item.title: RHEL/CentOS 6 to 7 in-place upgrades with HDP
item.description: Without a clean ‘supported’ process for upgrading CentOS/RHEL 6 to 7, migrating to CentOS/RHEL 7 on an existing HDP cluster is a challenge. With a little planning this can be accomplished with minimal disruption to your running cluster.
